Uses of Package
org.bukkit.enchantments

Packages that use org.bukkit.enchantments
org.bukkit.enchantments Classes relating to the specialized enhancements to item stacks, as part of the meta data. 
org.bukkit.event.enchantment Events triggered from an enchantment table. 
org.bukkit.inventory Classes involved in manipulating player inventories and item interactions. 
org.bukkit.inventory.meta The interfaces used when manipulating extra data can can be stored inside item stacks. 
 

Classes in org.bukkit.enchantments used by org.bukkit.enchantments
Enchantment
          The various type of enchantments that may be added to armour or weapons
EnchantmentTarget
          Represents the applicable target for a Enchantment
 

Classes in org.bukkit.enchantments used by org.bukkit.event.enchantment
Enchantment
          The various type of enchantments that may be added to armour or weapons
 

Classes in org.bukkit.enchantments used by org.bukkit.inventory
Enchantment
          The various type of enchantments that may be added to armour or weapons
 

Classes in org.bukkit.enchantments used by org.bukkit.inventory.meta
Enchantment
          The various type of enchantments that may be added to armour or weapons
